title: Sensor Constructor
shortDescription: Sensor Constructor is a multiplatform QT6 C++ application that allows users to construct sensors and view their data.
longDescription: Sensor Constructor works on MAC, Windows and Linux. It is a multiplatform application that allows users to visually construct sensors and view their data. We can also calculate the sensor length and CTE.
challenges: QT6 is a new framework and there are not many resources available for it.
